sense.definition: expressing passage, extension, or perception that goes (perhaps to many places) within (and, perhaps, out of) someplace/something; or alternatively, into and then out of (e.g., go through the tunnel)
being positioned/located beyond or at the far end of something, as of openings or obstacles (e.g., her house is through the woods)
expressing the extent of rotation/turning from one orientation to another (e.g., turn through 90 degrees)
so as to reach the end of (an experience, situation, or activity, often a tedious or stressful one) (e.g., worked through the process)
indicating a collection, container, inventory, or publication being at least partially searched or inspected (e.g., go through the newspaper)
indicating a means (X2) by which something (X1) happens or is done (e.g., got a job through his uncle)
up to and including (a particular point in an ordered sequence, often a point in time) (e.g., March 2nd through the 5th)
